short_description: darco-ca is a home builders & renovation contractor based in san jose, california, united states.
long_description: darco design construction is dedicated to transforming spaces into extraordinary environments. with a team of skilled professionals, we specialize in delivering high-quality custom homes that reflect your unique style. our commitment to excellence and client satisfaction sets us apart in the industry. husband, father, entrepreneur and with a business degree, darwin brings his international experience in construction of over 15 years. wife, mother of four, and with a civil engineer degree, larissa brings over 17 years of construction experience and 11 years in interior design. our mission is to create innovative, functional, and aesthetically pleasing spaces that enhance the lives of our clients. we strive to deliver exceptional service and craftsmanship, ensuring every project is completed to the highest standards. we envision a future where every client experiences the joy of living in a thoughtfully designed space. our goal is to be a leader in the construction and design industry, known for our creativity, integrity, and dedication to sustainable practices.
generated_description: darco construction, legally known as darco llc, is a custom home builder based in san jose, california. the company specializes in the design and construction of custom homes, including net zero homes, kitchen remodels, and additional dwelling units. they also offer services in commercial construction, including multi-family buildings, car dealerships, office buildings, retail stores, restaurants, and commercial remodels. darco construction is committed to excellence, quality, and client satisfaction, utilizing sustainable materials and practices. the company is led by president and ceo darwin fajardo and chief design officer larissa fajardo, who bring extensive experience in construction and interior design.
